feature.name: Power Spectrum Overall Standard Deviation
feature.description: A measure of the power of different frequency components. This is the overall standard deviation over all windows.

feature.name: Spectral Flux Overall Standard Deviation
feature.description: A measure of the amount of spectral change in a signal. Found by calculating the change in the magnitude spectrum from frame to frame. This is the overall standard deviation over all windows.

feature.name: Beat Histogram Overall Standard Deviation
feature.description: A histogram showing the relative strength of different rhythmic periodicities (tempi) in a signal. Found by calculating the auto-correlation of the RMS. This is the overall standard deviation over all windows.

feature.name: MFCC Overall Standard Deviation
feature.description: MFCC calculations based upon Orange Cow code This is the overall standard deviation over all windows.

feature.name: Power Spectrum Overall Average
feature.description: A measure of the power of different frequency components. This is the overall average over all windows.

feature.name: Spectral Flux Overall Average
feature.description: A measure of the amount of spectral change in a signal. Found by calculating the change in the magnitude spectrum from frame to frame. This is the overall average over all windows.

feature.name: Beat Histogram Overall Average
feature.description: A histogram showing the relative strength of different rhythmic periodicities (tempi) in a signal. Found by calculating the auto-correlation of the RMS. This is the overall average over all windows.

feature.name: MFCC Overall Average
feature.description: MFCC calculations based upon Orange Cow code This is the overall average over all windows.
